name: Khao Soi Soup
details: Khao soi is an ever-popular North Thai dish—and for good reason! It’s a thick, curried soup that’s served over a bed of rice noodles with a handful of savory toppings like pickled mustard greens and chili paste.

name: Thai Peanut Chicken and Noodles
details: This versatile chicken recipe is very similar to chicken pad Thai but easier to make and tastes just as good.

name: Larb Gai
details: Larb gai (Thai chicken salad) is a dish made with ground chicken, chiles, mint and basil.

name: Thai Shrimp Soup
details: This tasty soup comes together in minutes, and it’s a crowd pleaser. The ingredients are available in my little Maine grocery store, too.

name: Vegetarian Pad Thai
details: This is a simple pad thai loaded with crisp vegetables and zesty flavor. It’s quick, simple, and fresh-tasting.

name: Thai Coconut Beef
details: The beef is fantastic in this dish, but chicken or pork would be equally delicious!
